parts.text:
This is a recording of **Houston Control communicating with Apollo 13** after an explosion occurred on April 13, 1970.

It is notable because it captures the critical moment when astronaut Jack Swigert reported the famous line, **"Okay, Houston, we've had a problem here."** (or more accurately, "Houston, we've had a problem.") The recording then shows Houston trying to ascertain the nature of the problem, initially thinking it might be a minor electrical issue before the full gravity of the situation became clear. This incident led to a heroic effort to bring the damaged spacecraft and its crew safely back to Earth.
